title: Attachment Popup
behaviorsList: In one view, if there are more than 12 items, they should be scrollable.
Each attachment file name is editable by double-clicking on the file.
If uploading new files is not allowed, the upload button will be hidden.
The complete upload highlight will disappear after 5 seconds or upon exiting the popup.
Do not add any other elements within the attachment rows.
Upon hovering over an attachment file row, available options including the delete option will be shown.
The upload can be canceled at any time during the file upload process.
Clicking on the upload button at the top right will open the default file browser of the corresponding OS.
Do not use this for showcasing large attachments, like those over 25 MB.
When the upload is completed, a success message will be triggered.
Do not use this for more than 25 items. In such cases, use the OXD list view instead.
